   <style>
    .carousel-fade .carousel-inner .item {
   opacity: 0;
   transition-property: opacity;
 }
 
 .carousel-fade .carousel-inner .active {
   opacity: 1;
 }
 
 .carousel-fade .carousel-inner .active.left,
 .carousel-fade .carousel-inner .active.right {
   left: 0;
   opacity: 0;
   z-index: 1;
 }
 
 .carousel-fade .a-inner .next.left,
 .carousel-fade .carousel-inner .prev.right {
   opacity: 1;
 }
 
 .carousel-fade .carousel-control {
   z-index: 2;
 }
  
 @media all and (transform-3d), (-webkit-transform-3d) {
     .carousel-fade .carousel-inner > .item.next,
     .carousel-fade .carousel-inner > .item.active.right {
       opacity: 0;
       -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
               transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
     }
     .carousel-fade .carousel-inner > .item.prev,
     .carousel-fade .carousel-inner > .item.active.left {
       opacity: 0;
       -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
               transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
     }
     .carousel-fade .carousel-inner > .item.next.left,
     .carousel-fade .carousel-inner > .item.prev.right,
     .carousel-fade .carousel-inner > .item.active {
       opacity: 1;
       -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
               transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
     }
 } 
 
 #myCarousel > div > .item:nth-child(1) {
   background-image:url(img/lincoln.jpg);background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size:cover;; background-position:center;
 }

 }

 	.img-right {
 		display:block;
 		animation-duration: 3s; 
 		animation-fill-mode: both; 
 		opacity: 0;
 		margin-left:auto;
 		margin-right:auto;
 		}
 		
 	 @keyframes triggeredCSS4 {
 		0% { opacity: 0;transform: translateX(2000px) rotateY(180deg) scale(0.1);}
 		60% { opacity: 0.25; transform: translateX(30px) rotateY(90deg) scale(0.5);}
 		80% { opacity: 0.5; transform: translateX(30px) rotateY(30deg) scale(1.25);}
 		100% {opacity: 1.0; transform: translateX(0px) rotateY(0deg) scale(1.0);}
 		}
 	
 	@media screen and (max-width:1199px)	{
 		
 		 @keyframes triggeredCSS4 {
 				0% { opacity: 0;transform: translateX(2000px) rotateY(180deg) scale(0.1);}
 				60% { opacity: 0.25; transform: translateX(30px) rotateY(90deg) scale(0.5);}
 				80% { opacity: 0.5; transform: translateX(30px) rotateY(30deg) scale(1.25);}
 				100% {opacity: 1.0; transform: translateX(0px) rotateY(0deg) scale(1.0);}
 				}
 		}
 		
 		
 	 
 	 .triggeredCSS4 {
 		animation-name: triggeredCSS4;
 		}

 		display:block;
 		animation-duration: 3s; 
 		animation-fill-mode: both; 
 		opacity: 0;
 		margin-left:auto;
 		margin-right:auto;
 		}
 	 
 	 @keyframes triggeredCSS3 {
 		0% { opacity: 0;transform: translateX(-2000px) rotateY(180deg) scale(0.1);}
 		60% { opacity: 0.25; transform: translateX(160px) rotateY(90deg) scale(0.5);}
 		80% { opacity: 0.5; transform: translateX(160px) rotateY(30deg) scale(1.25);}
 		100% {opacity: 1.0; transform: translateX(0px) rotateY(0deg) scale(1.0);}
 		}
 		
 		
 	@media screen and (max-width:1199px)	{
 		
 		 @keyframes triggeredCSS3 {
 				0% { opacity: 0;transform: translateX(-2000px) rotateY(180deg) scale(0.1);}
 				60% { opacity: 0.25; transform: translateX(160px) rotateY(90deg) scale(0.5);}
 				80% { opacity: 0.5; transform: translateX(160px) rotateY(30deg) scale(1.25);}

 				}
 		}

 		animation-name: triggeredCSS3;
 		}

 		100% {opacity: 1.0; transform: translateX(0px) scale(1.0);}
 		}

 		animation-name: triggeredCSS5;

   <div class="modal fade" id="messageDialog" role="dialog">
    <div class="modal-dialog">
     <!-- Modal content-->
     <div class="modal-content">
      <div class="modal-header">
       <button class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
        ×
       </button>
       <h4 class="modal-title" id="messageTitle">
        Modal Header
       </h4>
      </div>
      <form id="modal-form" method="post">
       <div class="modal-body" id="messageBody">
        <p>
         Some text in the modal.
        </p>
       </div>
       <div class="modal-footer">
        <button class="btn btn-default" id="ok" type="submit">
         OK
        </button>
        <button class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
         Close
        </button>
       </div>
      </form>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <!-- Trigger the modal with a button -->
   <script>
    function showMessage(tit,bod,alt) { 
 	$("#messageTitle").html(tit); 
 	$("#messageBody").html(bod); 
 	if(alt) { $('#ok').hide(); }
 	else { $('#ok').show(); }
 	$("#messageDialog").modal(); 
 	return false; 
 	}
  
 /* password generator
 var pwdChars = "0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
 var pwdLen = 10;
 var randPassword = Array(pwdLen).fill(pwdChars).map(function(x) { return x[Math.floor(Math.random() * x.length)] }).join('');
 */
 
 function modifyUser(){
 	
 		var data = '<script> siteusers = [];';
 		
 	    var mess = '<div class="row">\n';
 		
 		 
 		mess += '<input type="hidden" id="userid" name="userid" value="">';
 	
 		 
 		
 		mess += '</div>';
 		
 		mess +='<div class="row">\n';
 		mess += '<div class="col-sm-6">\n';
 		
 		mess += '<ul>\n';
 		mess += '	<li>Name should correspond to how user will be called (for example Mr. John Smith)</li>'; 
 		mess += '	<li>To leave password the same keep fields empty</li>\n';
 		mess += '	<li>Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.</li>\n';
 		mess += '	<li>passwords must contain:';
 		mess += '		<ul>';
 		mess += '			<li>At least one uppercase letter.</li>';
 		mess += '			<li>At least one lowercase letter.</li>';
 		mess += '			<li>At least one number.</li>';
 		mess += '		</ul>';
 		mess += '	</li>';
 		mess += '	<li>Password and confirmation must match exactly.</li>';
 		mess += '</ul>';
 		mess += '</div>';
 		mess += '<div class="col-sm-6">';
 	
 		
 					mess += '<input type="hidden" id="role" name="role" value="">';
 			
 					
 		mess += '<input type="hidden" id="CUSTID" name="CUSTID" value="">\n'; 
 			
 			
 		mess += '<div class="row">Name: &nbsp;&nbsp;<br>';
 		mess += '<input id="name" name="name" required style="width:90%" value="" /></div>\n';
 		mess += '<div class="row">Email: &nbsp;&nbsp;<br>';
 		mess += '<input id="email" name="email" type="email" required style="width:90%" value="" /></div>';
 		mess += '<div class="row">New Password: &nbsp;&nbsp;<br><input id="password" name="password" type="password" style="width:75%" value="" ><button>generate</button></div>';
 		mess += '<div class="row">Confirm Password: &nbsp;&nbsp;<br><input name="confirm" type="password" style="width:90%" value="" ></div>';
 		mess += '</div>';
 		mess += '</div>';
 		
 		mess += data;
 		
 		
 		mess += 'function populateFields() { ';
 		mess += '	userid = $("#userid").val();	';
 		mess += ' 	$("#CUSTID").val(siteusers[userid].CUSTID);'; 
 		mess += '	$("#name").val(siteusers[userid].name);'; 
 		mess += '	$("#email").val(siteusers[userid].email);'; 
 		mess += ' } </'+'sc'+'ript>';
 		
 		$('.modal-dialog').width("80%");
 		$('#modal-form').on('submit',function() {
 			var form = document.getElementById("modal-form");
 			return testRegistration(form);
 			});			
 			
 		showMessage('Modify/Remove Site User',mess);
 		}
  
 function showRegistration(){
 	    var mess='<div class="row">';
 		mess += '<div class="col-sm-6">';
 		
 		mess += '<ul>';
 		mess += '	<li>Name should correspond to how you wish to be called (for example Mr. John Smith)</li>';
 		mess += '	<li>User IDs may contain only digits, upper and lowercase letters and underscores or be an email address.</li>';
 		mess += '	<li>Emails must have a valid email format.</li>';
 		mess += '	<li>Passwords must be at least 8 characters long.</li>';
 		mess += '	<li>passwords must contain:';
 		mess += '		<ul>';
 		mess += '			<li>At least one uppercase letter.</li>';
 		mess += '			<li>At least one lowercase letter.</li>';
 		mess += '			<li>At least one number.</li>';
 		mess += '		</ul>';
 		mess += '	</li>';
 		mess += '	<li>Your password and confirmation must match exactly.</li>';
 		mess += '</ul>';
 		mess += '</div>';
 		mess += '<div class="col-sm-6">';
 	
 		
 						mess += '<input type="hidden" name="CUSTID" value="">';
 				mess += '<input type="hidden" name="role" value="customer">';
 					 
 			
 		mess += '</div>';		
 		mess += '<div class="row">Name: &nbsp;&nbsp;<br>';
 		mess += '<input name="name" required style="width:90%" /></div>';
 		mess += '<div class="row">Email: &nbsp;&nbsp;<br>';
 		mess += '<input name="email" type="email" required style="width:90%" /></div>';
 		mess += '<div class="row">User ID: &nbsp;&nbsp;<br>';
 		mess += '<input name="userid" required style="width:90%" /></div>';
 		mess += '<div class="row">Password: &nbsp;&nbsp;<br><input name="password" required type="password" style="width:90%" ></div>';
 		mess += '<div class="row">Confirm Password: &nbsp;&nbsp;<br><input required name="confirm" type="password" style="width:90%" ></div>';
 		//mess += '<div class="row"><input type="checkbox" />';
 		mess += '</div>'; 
 		mess += '</div>';
 	
 		
 		$('.modal-dialog').width("80%");
 		$('#modal-form').on('submit',function() {
 			var form = document.getElementById("modal-form");
 			return testRegistration(form);
 			});			
 			
 		showMessage('Register Site User',mess);
 		}
   </script>
   <form id="logout" method="post" style="display:none">
    <input name="logout" type="hidden" value="true"/>
   </form>
   <form id="removeuser" method="post" style="display:none">
    <input id="removeid" name="removeid" type="hidden" value=""/>
   </form>
   <!-- Carousel
     ================================================== -->
   <div class="carousel slide carousel-fade" data-ride="carousel" id="myCarousel">
    <!-- Indicators -->
    <ol class="carousel-indicators">
     <li class="active" data-slide-to="0" data-target="#myCarousel">
     </li>
     <li data-slide-to="1" data-target="#myCarousel">
     </li>
     <li data-slide-to="2" data-target="#myCarousel">
     </li>
     <li data-slide-to="3" data-target="#myCarousel">
     </li>
    </ol>
    <div class="carousel-inner" role="listbox">
     <div class="item active">
      <div class="container">
       <div class="carousel-caption">

        </p>
        <!-- img class="about" id="about3"  title="location: Pioneers Park" src="/img/aboutsm.png" -->
       </div>

      <p class="about">
       <span>
        image location: Pioneers Park, Lincoln Nebraska
       </span>
      </p>
     </div>
     <div class="item">
      <div class="container">
       <div class="carousel-caption">
        <h1>
         Need Help Managing or Creating a Wordpress Site?
        </h1>
        <p>
         Whether you already have a Wordpress site that needs an update or you would like one, we can help!
        </p>
        <p>
         <a class="btn btn-lg btn-primary" href="/contact/" role="button">
          Contact Us Today!
         </a>
        </p>
        <!--img class="about" id="about4"  title="location: Spring Blossoms, Blair Ne"  src="/img/aboutsm.png" -->

      </div>

      <!--<h1 class="page-name">Who are we?</h1>
 	<p>Information Analytics was formed in early 1995 with the primary focus to provide information services such as web development, databases, mobile app development and custom programming. We have a longstanding reputation for providing custom solutions with great attention to customer service and support.</p>
 	<h1 class="page-name">What's New?</h1>
 	<p>We are pleased to announce that we have partnered with <a href="https://www.binary.net" target="blank">Binary Net</a> and <a href="http://www.infinitesys.com" target="blank">Infinite Systems</a>.  We now have access to a much larger staff to help with any Hosting, IT, Bandwidth, and Programming needs you have.  We are truly a one-stop-shop now and we are very excited to be moving forward with the new owner.  Our offices are still located in the Federal Trust Building in downtown Lincoln, Nebraska. Information Analytics will continue to provide web development and custom programming services.  IT Support and Managed Services will be provided by <a href="http://www.infinitesys.com" target="blank">Infinite Systems</a> and our hosting is now being maintained by <a href="https://www.binary.net" target="blank">Binary Net</a>.</p>
 	<h1 class="page-name">Contact Us Today!</h1>
 	<p>Call or <a href="/contact/">email</a> us today and find out how we can help meet your information technology needs.</p>

     <blockquote>
      We have had a great experience with Information Analytics. They are just as comfortable meeting with us to discuss larger new projects for quoting as they are in replying to a simple question via E-mail when our in-house staff needs an extra hand or advice on new technology. They have helped us with our three e-commerce sites, two mobile sites, and several traditional informational sites. Our latest sites are both dynamic and responsive.

   <script src="https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyD6tVPj1huwxzW6UydxrMatCinlmn-JULw&amp;libraries=places%2Cdrawing&amp;ver=0f4a4d1e1257e8c637793482af0695eb">
   </script>
   <script src="/js/sha512.js">
   </script>
   <script src="/js/forms.js">
   </script>
   <script>
    $('.carousel').carousel();
 	
 	;(function($, win) {
 	  $.fn.inViewport = function(cb) {
 		 return this.each(function(i,el){
 		   function visPx(){
 			 var H = $(this).height(),
 				 r = el.getBoundingClientRect(), t=r.top, b=r.bottom;
 			 return cb.call(el, Math.max(0, t>0? H-t : (b<H?b:H)));  
 		   } visPx();
 		   $(win).on("resize scroll", visPx);
 		 });
 	  };
 	}(jQuery, window));
 	
 	$(".img-center").inViewport(function(px){
 		if(px) $(this).addClass("triggeredCSS5") ;
 		});
 		
 	$(".img-circle").inViewport(function(px){
 		if(px) $(this).addClass("triggeredCSS3") ;
 		});
 
 	$(".img-right").inViewport(function(px){
 		if(px) $(this).addClass("triggeredCSS4") ;
 		});
 		
 	$(".odd").inViewport(function(px){
 		if(px) $(this).addClass("slidesinleft") ;
 		});
 		
 	$(".even").inViewport(function(px){
 		if(px) $(this).addClass("slidesinright") ;
 		}); 
 		
 /*	$(".first").inViewport(function(px){
 		if(px) $(this).addClass("enlarges") ;
 		}); */
   </script>
   <!-- IE10 viewport hack for Surface/desktop Windows 8 bug -->
   <script async="" src="js/ie10-viewport-bug-workaround.js">
   </script>
  </body>
 </html>
